page.title: 18Health Authority Offices
page.content:
The old{St.Clement Hospital}buildings now house the administrative offices of{Cornwall & Isles of Scilly Area {Health Authority.}From here the Nursing Service and all but three hospitals are managed throughout Cornwall by 180 headquarters staff.
Departments of administration include medical, nursing, treasury and works. They serve 4 units:{West Cornwall, {District Hospital (Treliske), {Mid-Cornwall}and{St.Lawrence's Unit.
There is within the buildings, the {Tresillian Ward}where 20 long-stay geriatrics are nursed.
The{National Health Service}is suffering a lot of financial cutbacks by the present Government.
